result.title: Segment tree with range update to a constant value and range max query.
result.content:
I was learning segment trees from this blog : http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/18051 It has most of the explanation of possible kind of scenarios except for this :

Update Query : L,R,X

Update all values from L to R to X.

Range max query L,R

Get the maximum value from L to R.

I know we have to use lazy propagation but I am not able to get the logic of lazy updates here. How do i proceed towards this ?
